Uses of Enum
io.netty.channel.epoll.EpollMode

Packages that use EpollMode
Package
Description
io.netty.channel.epoll
Optimized transport for linux which uses EPOLL Edge-Triggered Mode for maximal performance.

  • Uses of EpollMode in io.netty.channel.epoll
